item.description:
The encore production of the Metropolitan Opera's Simon Boccanegra by Giuseppe Verdi will be at the Fenway, February 24.

Tickets are around $18.

In this production Placido Domingo, one of the world's greatest tenors, will make history singing the title role in Verdi’s gripping political thriller, which is written for a baritone. Adrianne Pieczonka, Marcello Giordani, and James Morris are his co-stars in this moving and tragic story of a father and his lost daughter. James Levine conducts.

Conductor: James Levine; Production: Giancarlo del Monaco; Adrianne Pieczonka, Marcello Giordani, Plácido Domingo, James Morris

These productions have been spectacular - - in many ways better than a live performance. I hope that we will meet ahead of time at 5:30 for a quick bite someplace close to the theater. If you want to go, you will need to buy your ticket ahead of time as this can sell out.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be in the theater lobby before the show, wearing a white down jacket.
item.name: Placido Domingo and Verdi, February 24
